metadata.name: PNT22-01 X MAVI PRADO
metadata.description:
PANOT FLOR 2022-01 X MAVI PRADO
🚶‍♂️
A piece of 2000x2000px paving tile for your Metaverse.
🚶‍♀️
🎨 About the artist:
"Im venezuelan surrealist digital illustrator, based in Barcelona.
My artistic stamp is based on my peculiar creative style, loaded with dreamlike and surreal tints, where the female face, accompanied by an infinite palette of strident colors, textures, geometry and elements of nature, are in charge of transporting the viewer to a world of freedom, emotions, fantasy, mystery and strength where everything is possible.
My works are captivating, striking, fascinating and open to free interpretation and sensations of those who contemplate them."
🚶
Panot lives on the floor of your Metaverse to remind you the importance of keeping your feet on the ground, of growing step by step. Always respecting others.🚶‍♂️WALK-IN🚶
